items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t remember what Mary had told him to do.
I wish we were doing the same thing as Tom is doing.
I wonder how Tom put up with Mary for so many years.
I wonder if I can ask you a few questions about Tom.
I wonder if Tom is as interested in this as Mary is.
I\'m not going to do anything you don\'t want me to.
The large audience applauded when the song finished.
The problem is not what he said, but how he said it.
I don\'t think you\'re trying very hard to find Tom.
I can\'t believe that you actually got into Harvard.
